wordGroup: deleterious effect 毒害身心的作用，有毒影响

sentences.en: Petty crime is having a deleterious effect on community life.
sentences.cn: 轻罪对于社区生活正在产生有害影响。
然而，大多数突变是有害的。

sentences.en: It is also common knowledge that milk containing deleterious organisms is an unsuitable article of food.
sentences.cn: 乳品中含有有害微生物不适合食用是基本常识。
